title: Warlord of Mars

text: capital city of the Okar nation, which is the racial name of the
title: Warlord of Mars

title: Warlord of Mars

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: with a dead-black, lusterless stone, which appeared more like a
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: "There had been but three others cut from the mother stone," he
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: said, "which is in my possession.  These three are worn by nobles
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: high in my confidence, all of whom have been sent on secret missions
title: Warlord of Mars

text: to the court of Salensus Oll.

author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: feeling; it is caused by an electrical action that takes place the

title: Warlord of Mars

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars

title: Warlord of Mars

text: you."

title: Warlord of Mars

title: Warlord of Mars

title: Warlord of Mars

title: Warlord of Mars

text: the north.  Its crystal domes sparkled in the brilliant sunlight
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars

title: Warlord of Mars

text: IN DURANCE
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: The public houses of Barsoom, I have found, vary but little.  There
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: is no privacy for other than married couples.
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Men without their wives are escorted to a large chamber, the floor
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: of which is usually of white marble or heavy glass, kept scrupulously
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: clean.  Here are many small, raised platforms for the guest's sleeping
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: silks and furs, and if he have none of his own clean, fresh ones
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: are furnished at a nominal charge.
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Once a man's belongings have been deposited upon one of these
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: platforms he is a guest of the house, and that platform his own
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: until he leaves.  No one will disturb or molest his belongings, as
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: there are no thieves upon Mars.
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: As assassination is the one thing to be feared, the proprietors
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: of the hostelries furnish armed guards, who pace back and forth
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: through the sleeping-rooms day and night.  The number of guards and
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: gorgeousness of their trappings quite usually denote the status of
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: the hotel.
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: No meals are served in these houses, but generally a public eating
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: place adjoins them.  Baths are connected with the sleeping chambers,
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: and each guest is required to bathe daily or depart from the hotel.
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: Usually on a second or third floor there is a large sleeping-room
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: for single women guests, but its appointments do not vary materially
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: from the chamber occupied by men.  The guards who watch the women
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: remain in the corridor outside the sleeping chamber, while female
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: slaves pace back and forth among the sleepers within, ready to
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: notify the warriors should their presence be required.
title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

title: Warlord of Mars

title: Warlord of Mars
author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice

text: of power of the magnetic shaft, and now for many tedious years he

author: Burroughs, Edgar Rice
